title: 轉知花蓮衛生局1/7日免費流感疫苗施打訊息 Notice - Free Influenza Vaccination Service on January 7th
author: 王惠貞
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 學務處衛生保健組 - 王惠貞 - labi@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話8906253
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 轉知花蓮衛生局1/7日免費流感疫苗施打訊息 Notice - Free Influenza Vaccination Service on January 7th
日期： Fri, 5 Jan 2024 11:13:13 +0800

轉知花蓮縣衛生局免費流感疫苗施打服務
施打日期: 113年1月7(星期日)下午14:00-18:00
施打地點:遠東百貨1F H&M專櫃旁廣場
    備註:施打當日請攜帶健保卡。
   
相關訊息請上衛生局公告網址: https://reurl.cc/j3k3WL
花蓮縣衛生局，諮詢電話:03-8227141

                                     ～學生事務處衛生保健組關心您的健康～

Dear all,

We would like to inform you about the free influenza vaccination service provided by the Hualien County Health Bureau.

Vaccination Date: January 7th, 2024 (Sunday) from 14:00 to 18:00
Location: 1st Floor, Next to H&M Counter, Far Eastern Department Store 
Please note: On the day of vaccination, please bring your health insurance card.

For further information, please visit the Health Bureau's official announcement website: Health Bureau Announcement URL

For inquiries, please contact Hualien County Health Bureau at 03-8227141.

Stay healthy and protected!
